p.s: In the novel Maverick has an argument with Mr. Lewis about the King Lords.
In the movie one can see Mr. Lewis not a single time.
Also King is not presented in the passage in the novel but in the film he is.
The main purpose of this sequence is to show the police brutality and the situation black people live in.
They have to stand up and fight for equal rights.
It was the right thing what Starr did.
It was right that she filmed the whole situation to show how brutal the police is.
In the novel there is also one white police officer and one black officer.
It's an important thing that the black officer pulls Maverick down for no acceptable reason.
He should be the one who has to be on the side of the black community.
